thread.title: Spring break in NYC
thread.title_full: Spring break in NYC - Review of Millennium Broadway New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Cwheeler2014
title: Spring break in NYC
text:
We booked our reservations thru Expedia. There was some conflict on how rooms were presented on the Expedia site. Talked with Rori the GM, she took care of making sure we had great rooms with a view. This hotel is in a perfect spot and close to everything in Time Square. Everyone we meet that worked here, couldn't have been nicer.
Would definitely stay again.
